name: Half-Life 3
description: Pay up, nerds. This'll keep Steam's lights on for another thirty years.

name: Portal 3
description: Even writing this sentence just made me pop a blood vessel from joy.

name: Luigi's Eating Experience
description: Switch 3 coming next year, switch 2 is cancelled, NINTENDO OUT BITCHES.

name: Cooking Mama: Cookstar
description: We totally have the rights to use this IP this time just dont ask legal please.

name: Shifted Heart
description: HI GUYS, Claire Levin here, this is not a joke, this is a game my cousin actually made, currently listed on Steam, please check it out and wishlist it.

name: Star Fetchers
description: The best game ever made, just ask your mom ;)

name: Shenmue 69
description: Dont worry guys the story will actually end in this one we promise for sure just keep buying them.

name: Chronic the Hemphog
description: Look, we at Sega may not have figured out how to make a good sonic game yet, but maybe if you get high enough they'll start being funny at least.
